Quick service
I've lived in NY for a long time. This place is good if you love thin sliced pizza. I do not car for thin sliced pizza. And the flavor was good but I still don't understand the hype about this place.
Decent pizza. Sauce was a bit sweet for me. We waited a few minutes, but i wouldn't wait a real long time for it.

Went for lunch on a Tuesday at around 12:45pm. As usual, there was a line, but it moved really quickly and I was able to get my pizza 10 minutes later. Don’t let the line deter you from trying Joe’s! The pizza is great as always and the staff are nice. Never disappointed. I tried the caprese pizza and it was great!

There are a lot of people inside and outside so it can get hectic, but turnover for seats is quite quick and I got a seat on the bench outside almost right away.

The place is famous as it was featured on Spiderman. Inside has a cool, vintage vibe. Expect a 5-10 minute wait. The prices are cheap. The pizza is good but nothing groundbreaking. Come for the atmosphere and a decent slice—just don’t expect your mind to be blown!

Don’t believe the hype!

They gave me the Raggediest slice they had and it was dry. The Sicilian was “ok”. Sauce not flavorful enough for me. Maybe next week I’ll try them again and ask for a better slice because that kid was trying his damnedest to give away those dried up slices. He got me. Carnegie Pizza is definitely better.

PLUS 98% of customers on that line were tourists So that’s the reason for the high ratings.
Long queue to wait but Pizza is very tasty thin crust. Recommended for NYC authentic pizza!

Such a fun New York experience! If you want to get hot, fresh pizza and be in THE moment, definitely come grab a slice here and watch the world go by.

Truly is the best slice of NYC pizza I’ve ever had. It is incredible and worth the wait. If you show up later in the night, the wait will be less, but don’t be surprised to stand in line around the corner to try this spot. When I’m in town again, this is will be my first stop.

This viral place deserves its rep, luckily I visited at 10.30am and walked straight in.  A slice was affordable, hot, fresh and tasty.  Was it the best pizza I’ve eaten, no. Was it really good for the price yes.  Do they know how to bang out slices fast and fresh yes they do.  Overall a great experience however personally I wouldn’t queue for 30+ minutes for a slice

It was very delicious. I've been to this place a few times and tried different pizzas. The service is very good, and the staff is attentive. The atmosphere is pleasant, but it was quite crowded—I wish there was more space.
I went to this place with friends and we were very satisfied. The pizza was delicious. I recommend it to everyone who wants to try New York style pizza. We will definitely come again.
It's a good pizza, but I was hoping it would be great, it's actually good but not extremely good.
